1 #include "ackermann_ekf/imu_sensor.h"
2 
3 #include <geometry_msgs/TransformStamped.h>
4 #include <string>
5 
6 namespace ackermann_ekf {
7 
8 ImuSensor::ImuSensor(SensorArray &sensor_array,
9  const XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue &params, ros::NodeHandle &nh)
10  : Sensor(sensor_array, params) {
11  // Disallow measurements which cannot be measured by this sensor from beeing
12  // fused
13  measurement_.mask[Measurement::X] = false;
14  measurement_.mask[Measurement::Y] = false;
15  measurement_.mask[Measurement::Z] = false;
16  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dx_dt] = false;
17  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dy_dt] = false;
18  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dz_dt] = false;
19 
20  accel_mask_ = measurement_.mask[Measurement::d2x_dt2] ||
21  measurement_.mask[Measurement::d2y_dt2] ||
22  measurement_.mask[Measurement::d2z_dt2];
23  angular_vel_mask_ = measurement_.mask[Measurement::droll_dt] ||
24  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dpitch_dt] ||
25  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dyaw_dt];
26  orientation_mask_ = measurement_.mask[Measurement::Roll] ||
27  measurement_.mask[Measurement::Pitch] ||
28  measurement_.mask[Measurement::Yaw];
29 
30  std::string topic = static_cast<std::string>(params["topic"]);
31 
32  ROS_INFO("Adding Imu sensor on topic %s", topic.c_str());
33 
34  subscriber_ = nh.subscribe(topic, 10, &ImuSensor::callback, this);
35 }
36 
37 void ImuSensor::set_cov_xyz(const tf2::Transform transform, const int index[3],
38  const boost::array<double, 9> &cov) {
39  tf2::Matrix3x3 covariance_matrix =
40  transform.getBasis() *
41  tf2::Matrix3x3(cov[0], cov[1], cov[2], cov[3], cov[4], cov[5], cov[6],
42  cov[7], cov[8]) *
43  transform.getBasis().transpose();
44  for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
45  measurement_.R(index[i / 3], index[i % 3]) =
46  covariance_matrix[i / 3][i % 3];
47  }
48 }
49 
50 void ImuSensor::callback(const sensor_msgs::Imu::ConstPtr &msg) {
51  // If we have been told to include some piece of data (*_mask_ is true) but
52  // the data doesn't exist (*_covariance[0] == -1) we return.
53  // \todo Update imu mask depending on whether data is present or not for
54  // acceleration, angular velocity and orientation separately instead of
55  // togheter
56  if ((accel_mask_ && msg->linear_acceleration_covariance[0] == -1) ||
57  (angular_vel_mask_ && msg->linear_acceleration_covariance[0] == -1) ||
58  (orientation_mask_ && msg->linear_acceleration_covariance[0] == -1)) {
59  return;
60  }
61 
62  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transform;
63  if (!sensor_array_.get_transform(transform, msg->header)) {
64  // If no transform exists we cannot determine e.g. sensor position so we
65  // are forced to discard the measurement
66  return;
67  }
68 
69  this->set_sensor_position(transform);
70 
71  tf2::Transform T;
72  tf2::fromMsg(transform.transform, T);
73  // Remove translation from transform, we only want rotation
74  T.setOrigin(tf2::Vector3(0, 0, 0));
75 
76  // Rotate measurements to local coordinate system
77  tf2::Quaternion orientation =
78  T * tf2::Quaternion(msg->orientation.x, msg->orientation.y,
79  msg->orientation.z, msg->orientation.w);
80  tf2::Vector3 angular_velocity =
81  T * tf2::Vector3(msg->angular_velocity.x, msg->angular_velocity.y,
82  msg->angular_velocity.z);
83  tf2::Vector3 linear_acceleration =
84  T * tf2::Vector3(msg->linear_acceleration.x, msg->linear_acceleration.y,
85  msg->linear_acceleration.z);
86 
87  tf2::Matrix3x3(orientation)
88  .getRPY(measurement_.z(Measurement::Roll),
89  measurement_.z(Measurement::Pitch),
90  measurement_.z(Measurement::Yaw));
91  measurement_.z(Measurement::droll_dt) = angular_velocity.x();
92  measurement_.z(Measurement::dpitch_dt) = angular_velocity.y();
93  measurement_.z(Measurement::dyaw_dt) = angular_velocity.z();
94  measurement_.z(Measurement::d2x_dt2) = linear_acceleration.x();
95  measurement_.z(Measurement::d2y_dt2) = linear_acceleration.y();
96  measurement_.z(Measurement::d2z_dt2) = linear_acceleration.z();
97 
98  int RPY[3] = {Measurement::Roll, Measurement::Pitch, Measurement::Yaw};
99  int drpy_dt[3] = {Measurement::droll_dt, Measurement::dpitch_dt,
100  Measurement::dyaw_dt};
101  int dxyz2_dt2[3] = {Measurement::d2x_dt2, Measurement::d2y_dt2,
102  Measurement::d2z_dt2};
103 
104  set_cov_xyz(T, RPY, msg->orientation_covariance);
105  set_cov_xyz(T, drpy_dt, msg->angular_velocity_covariance);
106  set_cov_xyz(T, dxyz2_dt2, msg->linear_acceleration_covariance);
107 
108  measurement_.time = msg->header.stamp.toSec();
109 
110  sensor_array_.process_measurement(measurement_);
111 }
112
